scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Hana no Tou', the ending theme for Lycoris Recoil.
Transition segment featuring highlights of previous performances and upcoming members.
Performance of the song 'Seiza ni Naretara' from the series Bocchi the Rock!.

subtitles.original: ことはできないのでしょう
subtitles.english: ...it's impossible, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 君が手を差し伸べた
subtitles.english: You reached out your hand

subtitles.original: 光で影が生まれる
subtitles.english: Shadows are born from light

subtitles.original: 歌って聴かせて この話の続き
subtitles.english: Sing for me, the rest of this story

subtitles.original: 連れていってみたことない星まで
subtitles.english: Take me to a star I've never seen before

subtitles.original: 誰もが声も届かない
subtitles.english: Where no one's voice can reach

subtitles.original: 高くそびえ立った塔の上
subtitles.english: Atop a high-towering tower

subtitles.original: 飛ばす風船葛
subtitles.english: Releasing heartseed vines...

subtitles.original: 僕は君に笑ってほしいんだ
subtitles.english: ...I want you to smile

subtitles.original: 満たされない穴 うわべの会話や済ましたポーズで
subtitles.english: An unfulfilled hole, with superficial conversations and cool poses...

subtitles.original: これまで埋めてきたけど
subtitles.english: ...I've been filling it up until now

subtitles.original: 退屈な日々を蹴散らして
subtitles.english: Kicking away the boring days

subtitles.original: 君と二人でこの街を
subtitles.english: Together with you, in this city...

subtitles.original: 泳げたなら それは
subtitles.english: ...if we could swim, that...

subtitles.original: どれだけ素敵なことでしょう
subtitles.english: ...would be so wonderful

subtitles.original: 出したことないほど大きな声で
subtitles.english: With a voice louder than I've ever made

subtitles.original: やっと君に伝わる
subtitles.english: I'll finally reach you

subtitles.original: いびつな暗い朝 きっとちょうどいいな
subtitles.english: A distorted, dark morning is probably just right

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Tying together the ends of the world

subtitles.original: 窓に飾った絵画をなぞって
subtitles.english: Tracing the painting decorated on the window

subtitles.original: 一人で宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english: Traveling through space alone

subtitles.original: それだけでも不自由ないけど
subtitles.english: I don't feel any lack with just that, but...

subtitles.original: 僕は選んでみたいの 高鳴る心 なぞだらけの空を
subtitles.english: I want to choose my beating heart and the sky full of mysteries

subtitles.original: 安全なループを
subtitles.english: The safe loop...

subtitles.original: いま書き換えて
subtitles.english: ...rewriting it right now

subtitles.original: 君の手を握ってしまったら
subtitles.english: Once I've taken your hand

subtitles.original: この孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: In this city that doesn't know this loneliness...

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰ってくる
subtitles.english: ...I suppose I can...

subtitles.original: ことはできないのでしょう
subtitles.english: ...never return again

subtitles.original: いくらでも迷いながら
subtitles.english: While getting lost as much as I want

subtitles.original: 光も影も見に行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go see both the light and the shadow

subtitles.original: 歌って聴かせて この話の続き
subtitles.english: Sing for me, the rest of this story

subtitles.original: 連れていってみたことない星まで
subtitles.english: Take me to a star I've never seen before

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Tying together the ends of the world

subtitles.original: NEXT
subtitles.english: NEXT

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は6時
subtitles.english: The clock will soon strike six

subtitles.original: もうそこに一番星
subtitles.english: The first star is already there

subtitles.original: 影を踏んで夜に
subtitles.english: Stepping on shadows...

subtitles.original: 紛れたくなる帰り道
subtitles.english: ...wanting to vanish into the night on the way home

subtitles.original: どんなに探してみても
subtitles.english: No matter how much I look...

subtitles.original: 一つしかない星
subtitles.english: ...there's only one star

subtitles.original: 何億光年離れた...
subtitles.english: Billions of light-years away...
